question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.After being involved in an accident, you were looked after by a person you did not know before. Write a special thank you letter to express your gratitude.In your letter:Introduce yourself and let him/her know why you are writingExpress your appreciationAnd offer him/ her to visit your home with this family.You do NOT need to write any address.You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter to tell you that I am very grateful for your kind action. Taking care of me during my recovery in the hospital was really noble on your part. Therefore, I like to invite you to my house for dinner in order to return you the favour.

My name is Ali Hammoud. I am married with two kids: a girl aged sixteen and a young boy who will turn nine next week. I live in a small flat in the centre of the city near to the train station, so it will be easy for you to reach my current address.

In fact, I am amazed by what you did for me on the day of the accident. The nurse told me that you stayed there with my family during all my recovery days. In addition, I truly appreciate that you donated your blood to me where other strangers will consider many times before doing it.

On this occasion, I would offer you a family meeting next Sunday at 8:00 PM as sign of gratitude. My wife will cook us a turkey with some vegetables from our garden. After that, we will celebrate the birthday of my younger child.
Thank you again for everything, and I hope that you will accept my modest invitation.
